Container.name: fixed
Container.description: Whether the container should adjust its max-width based on the current screen size.

Flex.name: align
Flex.description: The alignment of the container's children.

Flex.name: gap
Flex.description: The gap between rows and columns.

Flex.name: justify
Flex.description: The justification of the container's children.

Flex.name: orientation
Flex.description: The orientation of the container's children.

Flex.name: wrap
Flex.description: Whether the container's should wrap when overflown.

Grid.name: columns
Grid.description: Shorthand for the gridTemplateColumns css property.

Grid.name: flow
Grid.description: Shorthand for the gridAutoFlow css property.

Grid.name: gap
Grid.description: The gap between rows and columns.

Grid.name: rows
Grid.description: Shorthand for the gridTemplateRows css property.

GridItem.name: area
GridItem.description: Shorthand for the gridArea css property.

GridItem.name: column
GridItem.description: Shorthand for the gridColumn css property.

GridItem.name: columnEnd
GridItem.description: Shorthand for the gridColumnEnd css property.

GridItem.name: columnStart
GridItem.description: Shorthand for the gridColumnStart css property.

GridItem.name: order
GridItem.description: Shorthand for the order css property.

GridItem.name: row
GridItem.description: Shorthand for the gridRow css property.

GridItem.name: rowEnd
GridItem.description: Shorthand for the gridRowEnd css property.

GridItem.name: rowStart
GridItem.description: Shorthand for the gridRowStart css property.

Stack.name: gap
Stack.description: The gap between elements in the stack.

Stack.name: orientation
Stack.description: The layout orientation  of the stack.
